Question: What was Kaikeyi's final declaration to Manthara in the chamber of wrath about Rama's exile and Bharata's enthronement?
Context: The queen committed fully to the treacherous plan. Inspired by Manthara, Kaikeyi cast her pearl necklace on the ground, rolling on the floor, and declared: "O Kubija, either Rama shall go into exile and Bharata obtain the kingdom, or King Dasaratha will have news of my death. I shall neither put on ornaments, nor partake of delicious dishes; if Rama is installed, it shall be the end of my life".
